meanings.definition: Make (something or someone) free of dirt, marks, or mess, especially by washing, wiping, or brushing.
meanings.sent1: She cleans her room every Saturday morning.
meanings.sent2: Mom cleans the dishes after dinner.
meanings.sent3: The magical sponge cleans up messes in seconds!
meanings.sent4: His laughter cleansed the tension in the room.
meanings.sent5: The rain cleans the dusty streets, leaving them fresh and shiny.

meanings.definition: Remove unwanted substances from (an object or surface).
meanings.sent1: He cleans the graffiti off the wall with a brush.
meanings.sent2: The maid cleans the stains from the carpet.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's power is to clean away all evil.
meanings.sent4: Her smile cleansed his worries and fears.
meanings.sent5: The wind cleans the fallen leaves from the sidewalk.

meanings.sent1: Prayer cleanses the soul and brings peace.
meanings.sent2: The ritual cleanses the sacred space before the ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The kind words cleansed the hurt feelings.
meanings.sent4: Her forgiveness cleansed the bitterness from their relationship.
meanings.sent5: The sunrise cleanses the darkness of the night, bringing hope for a new day.
